document_data.name: The Black Eye
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Eye''' was an [[Eye of Gruumsh (title)|Eye of Gruumsh]] [[orc]] shaman who lived in the [[Many-Arrows]]-occupied [[Tower District]]{{NWDistricts}} of [[Neverwinter]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Black Eye acted as the guardian of a shrine of [[Gruumsh]] that had been erected by the Many-Arrows orcs in the district's Merchant Square.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, the Black Eye fought a battle with [[Gord Roundshield]] and wounded the [[dwarf]] in the gut. To get his revenge, Gord Roundshield enlisted a [[dwarven]] [[adventurer]] to kill the Black Eye and burn his shrine to the ground to draw the shaman out.
